verses.verse: And Bezaleel <WH1212> made <WH6213> <WH8799> the ark <WH727> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>: two cubits <WH520> and a half <WH2677> was the length <WH753> of it, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the breadth <WH7341> of it, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the height <WH6967> of it:
And he overlaid <WH6823> <WH8762> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> within <WH1004> and without <WH2351>, and made <WH6213> <WH8799> a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> to it round about <WH5439>.

And he cast <WH3332> <WH8799> for it four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091>, to be set by the four <WH702> corners <WH6471> of it; even two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> upon the one <WH259> side <WH6763> of it, and two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> upon the other <WH8145> side <WH6763> of it.
And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlaid <WH6823> <WH8762> them with gold <WH2091>.
And he put <WH935> <WH8686> the staves <WH905> into the rings <WH2885> by the sides <WH6763> of the ark <WH727>, to bear <WH5375> <WH8800> the ark <WH727>.

And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> the mercy seat <WH3727> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>: two cubits <WH520> and a half <WH2677> was the length <WH753> thereof, and one cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the breadth <WH7341> thereof.

And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> two <WH8147> cherubims <WH3742> of gold <WH2091>, beaten out of one piece <WH4749> made <WH6213> <WH8804> he them, on the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the mercy seat <WH3727>;

One <WH259> cherub <WH3742> on the end <WH7098> on this side, and another <WH259> cherub <WH3742> on the other end <WH7098> on that side: out of the mercy seat <WH3727> made <WH6213> <WH8804> he the cherubims <WH3742> on the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> <WH8675> <WH7099> thereof.

And the cherubims <WH3742> spread out <WH6566> <WH8802> their wings <WH3671> on high <WH4605>, and covered <WH5526> <WH8802> with their wings <WH3671> over the mercy seat <WH3727>, with their faces <WH6440> one <WH376> to another <WH251>; even to the mercy seatward <WH3727> were the faces <WH6440> of the cherubims <WH3742>.

And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> the table <WH7979> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>: two cubits <WH520> was the length <WH753> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the height <WH6967> thereof:
And he overlaid <WH6823> <WH8762> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, and made <WH6213> <WH8799> thereunto a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round about <WH5439>.

Also he made <WH6213> <WH8799> thereunto a border <WH4526> of an handbreadth <WH2948> round about <WH5439>; and made <WH6213> <WH8799> a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> for the border <WH4526> thereof round about <WH5439>.

And he cast <WH3332> <WH8799> for it four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091>, and put <WH5414> <WH8799> the rings <WH2885> upon the four <WH702> corners <WH6285> that were in the four <WH702> feet <WH7272> thereof.
Over against <WH5980> the border <WH4526> were the rings <WH2885>, the places <WH1004> for the staves <WH905> to bear <WH5375> <WH8800> the table <WH7979>.
And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> the staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlaid <WH6823> <WH8762> them with gold <WH2091>, to bear <WH5375> <WH8800> the table <WH7979>.

And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> the vessels <WH3627> which were upon the table <WH7979>, his dishes <WH7086>, and his spoons <WH3709>, and his bowls <WH4518>, and his covers <WH7184> to cover <WH5258> <WH8714> withal <WH2004>, of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>.

And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> the candlestick <WH4501> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>: of beaten work <WH4749> made <WH6213> <WH8804> he the candlestick <WH4501>; his shaft <WH3409>, and his branch <WH7070>, his bowls <WH1375>, his knops <WH3730>, and his flowers <WH6525>, were of the same:

And six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going out <WH3318> <WH8802> of the sides <WH6654> thereof; three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the candlestick <WH4501> out of the one <WH259> side <WH6654> thereof, and three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the candlestick <WH4501> out of the other <WH8145> side <WH6654> thereof:

Three <WH7969> bowls <WH1375> made after the fashion of almonds <WH8246> <WH8794> in one <WH259> branch <WH7070>, a knop <WH3730> and a flower <WH6525>; and three <WH7969> bowls <WH1375> made like almonds <WH8246> <WH8794> in another <WH259> branch <WH7070>, a knop <WH3730> and a flower <WH6525>: so throughout the six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going out <WH3318> <WH8802> of the candlestick <WH4501>.
And in the candlestick <WH4501> were four <WH702> bowls <WH1375> made like almonds <WH8246> <WH8794>, his knops <WH3730>, and his flowers <WH6525>:

And a knop <WH3730> under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of the same, and a knop <WH3730> under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of the same, and a knop <WH3730> under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of the same, according to the six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going out <WH3318> <WH8802> of it.
Their knops <WH3730> and their branches <WH7070> were of the same: all of it was one <WH259> beaten work <WH4749> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>.
And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> his seven <WH7651> Menorahs <WH5216>, and his snuffers <WH4457>, and his snuffdishes <WH4289>, of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>.
Of a talent <WH3603> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> made <WH6213> <WH8804> he it, and all the vessels <WH3627> thereof.

And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> the incense <WH7004> altar <WH4196> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>: the length <WH753> of it was a cubit <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> of it a cubit <WH520>; it was foursquare <WH7251> <WH8803>; and two cubits <WH520> was the height <WH6967> of it; the shofars <WH7161> thereof were of the same.

And he overlaid <WH6823> <WH8762> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, both the top <WH1406> of it, and the sides <WH7023> thereof round about <WH5439>, and the shofars <WH7161> of it: also he made <WH6213> <WH8799> unto it a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round about <WH5439>.

And he made <WH6213> <WH8804> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> for it under the crown <WH2213> thereof, by the two <WH8147> corners <WH6763> of it, upon the two <WH8147> sides <WH6654> thereof, to be places <WH1004> for the staves <WH905> to bear <WH5375> <WH8800> it withal.
And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> the staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlaid <WH6823> <WH8762> them with gold <WH2091>.

And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> the holy <WH6944> anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and the pure <WH2889> incense <WH7004> of sweet spices <WH5561>, according to the work <WH4639> of the apothecary <WH7543> <WH8802>.
